casebody.data:
PARAGON OIL COMPANY v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE. No. 295. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. June 1, 1931. Merrick A. Whipple, of Tulsa, OH., for petitioner. C. M. Charest, Gen. Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

.Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and Me-DERMOTT, Circuit Judges.'

PER CURIAM.

Petition dismissed June 1, 1931, on motion of petitioner.
